prompts.value: Of course, I can help! Could you please tell me your One8 Order ID? It usually starts with O18-.
To check your status, I'll need your full Order Number, please.
What is the tracking number for your purchase?
Please provide the order ID so I can look it up.
I need your order reference. Please type it here!

speech: Thank you! I found the Order ID $order_identifier. I am now checking the live status...
Processing request for $order_identifier. It shows your package is currently 'Out for Delivery' and expected today by 7 PM.
Got it! $order_identifieris the number. Please click this link for the real-time tracking page
Your order is on its way! I see order $order_identifier is at the city hub.
The system indicates your order $order_identifier has been successfully delivered. Please confirm you received it.
